<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thunder God's Fan](/Feats.aspx?ID=5690) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=776" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 35 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Tengu Feather Fan](/Feats.aspx?ID=5685)

</column>

---

Your fan unleashes the fury of the storm. You can use the Wave Fan activation one additional time per day. Add a 5th-rank [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1586) spell to the spells contained within your fan.
